trans-unit.source: Contains information about a connector at a specified coordinate in <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> and all classes that inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre um conector numa coordenada especificado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> e todas as classes herdam dela.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations"></xref> that defines the location on the connector that the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations"> </xref> que define a localização no conector que o utilizador clica no.

trans-unit.source: The index identifier of the connector that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de índice do conector que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Prior to the constructor call the connector index was set to less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Antes da chamada do construtor que o índice do conector foi definido como inferior a zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connector that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador para o conector foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the connector that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> bounds que o conector foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref:System.Object>é igual a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref:System.Object>é igual a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the connector that the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o índice do conector que o utilizador clica no.

trans-unit.source: The index of the connector that the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: O índice do conector que o utilizador clica no.

trans-unit.source: Gets a selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto selecionável associado à área de acessos.

trans-unit.source: A selectable <xref:System.Object> associated with the area where the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um selecionável <xref:System.Object>associado à área de onde o utilizador clica.</xref:System.Object>
